meanings.sent1: The interepidemic period was a time of calm between the outbreaks.
meanings.sent2: The interepidemic phase allowed the community to recover before the next epidemic.
meanings.sent3: During the interepidemic lull, the town prepared for any future outbreaks.
meanings.sent4: The interepidemic intervals were like brief respites in the storm of disease.
meanings.sent5: The interepidemic peace was shattered when the next epidemic struck.

meanings.definition: Not related to or characteristic of an epidemic.
meanings.sent1: The interepidemic cases puzzled the doctors as they were not part of the epidemic pattern.
meanings.sent2: Her symptoms were interepidemic, showing no signs of the prevailing illness.
meanings.sent3: The interepidemic nature of the illness made it difficult to diagnose.
meanings.sent4: His interepidemic condition was a mystery to the medical experts.
meanings.sent5: The interepidemic illness seemed to defy all known patterns of disease.
